twitch_info.title: Highlight: 243+ Hours of Enhanced Interrogation Techniques

message.body: provocative and stimulating, you heard it here
hello
finally i catched your stream
welcome!
I am sleep deprived these days so the gameplay will not be stella
but I also have more practice so maybe it will even out
I did much better at 0.9x yesterday when I was well rested
sleep deprived? like at all? :p
I got about 7 hours
but I need 12
or youre just having bad sleep lately
oh, my average is 5 hours
because of school
pretty unhealthy
it's because I need to be awake at the same time every day, but my circadian rhythm is not on a 24 hour schedule, it shifts forward
I also got very little sleep in school for that reason
this week i got my own antirecord
3,5 hrs
of sleep
that must be very uncormfortable
and I can't do anything with myself
yeah, when you are that sleep-deprived, you can't really think about anything, or work
every time i get to a bed earlier, im starting to sleep on the same time
no matter
yeah, I have a similar problem
so weekends are like a fresh air
when I can finally get a good sleep
It's nice
but then you have to wake up at the same time during school days, so it makes that even harder
are you still studying in a school?
like me
or you got to university or smth
I'd rather not talk about stuff like that, since it's personal
sorry
that's ok!!
some people are more comfortable sharing that
i finally managed to move in my battlegrounds journey
it only took 10 days right?
im so glad you can't even understand
yeah, and in some days i didn't play
having a rest
well, 12*
i counted
then you must have played for a very long time on those days where you did play
hmm, using simple maths... about 2 hrs in a day
oh, so it was 12 days of play, not 12 days total?
I thought the 12 days might've included the breaks
well 2 hours is a big number, id better say about 1 hour of grind in a day
12 days including breaks!
but with some days where i didn't play
it is like 2 or 3 days
I mean, if it was 12 days, but you didn't play every day, and yet it took 24 hours, then you must have played more than 2 hours a day on average on the days where you did play
sorry, this must feel like math class
lately i was playing way more time than before
because i felt the clear
yesterday i played about 3-4 hrs
I also decided to start playing more recently
after dragonxplayer cleare mayumushi, it made me want to try harder
dragonx is crazy
5(?) finals in 60(?) hours
yes, he is very good
his clear was 90 hours
even with practice pretty good results
approximately
yeah, if adding practice time than 90 hrs
he also cleared soulless in ~15 hours!!
id say it is the fastest clear
if i remember
wait, he did?
he did
recently
couple of days ago
yeah, second faster clear is nader
that made me also want to start a serious soulless grind
even though he said soulless isn't very enjoyable?
but i still can't get myself to do it
soulless is one of most enjoyable grinds for me
i already cleared it with 2 hits
and these hits are stupid as hell
which means im capable of
clearing it
since you've cleared harder stuff already, I have no doubt you are capable
can't force myself to play it when there's gureiga stage waiting for me
maybe as a break from tomo stage?
makes sense
probably i will start grinding soulless after gureiga clear
because tomo is casino
lottery
las vegas
slot machine
all the good ones
clear today
LUL
I swear I am getting closer
well probably im too preconceived about tomo
I was getting very comfortable with 0.9x speed yesterday ubur
what if it will be enjoyable for me??? who knows
@ubur hello so true
so the plan is 1.0 after than, where I will get some additional practice on other parts of the avoidance, then go for attempts until I clear
@xoryla max claims it's not luck
so maybe it will be ok
but max also says things like "I wouldn't mind dying to a 15 speed bullet in vox diamond" so I don't know
vox diamond absolute, of course
i compared vox diamond and vox absolute recently
god
what a levelup
yeah, it's absurd
the speed just goes through the roof
tomo was not thinking
tomo was just on a roll
he wanted to make a buffed ver of his avoidance and he absolutely accomplished it
he took something that was already kind of luckbased and made it more luckbased LUL
smart
decision
yes, he is a genius
feel bad for ao
that already has 70(?) hours
with final attack pb
no one is forcing him to play it but himself, so I do not feel bad for him. he chose this path
of course, I do feel bad for him in the sense that he has run out of things to play
i mean he has put such a hard work into this grind that it would be meaningless to abandone the avoidance
at this point
yeah, but everyone knew this was a possibility
it was no secret that this is what the game is like
he could have just not even tried
well he managed to beat last tis last year so im confident in his clear
no matter when it will happen
yeah, he can do it
it's just luck, after all
do you yourself have any interest in anything harder than DS?
don't know if my hands get to mayumushi grind
but it would be interesting
because of infinite jump?
too many patterns
oh yeah, same
mostly due to that
well, too many patterns is acceptable
but
too many HARD patterns
questionable
yeah, the patterns are serious business
it's not a pure barrage
nevertheless i have a practice tool for it
but even learning hard pattern stuff is pretty annoying
the inbuilt one or a custom one?
inbuilt
savehack moment
there is no shame
in practicing
true
well i already cleared an insane avoidance without one
yes, that was crazy
so if mayumushi moment happens
i will definitely practice it
I feel like, in order to keep progressing, it is necessary to challenge harder stuff
but I also think that it is okay to play easier stuff as well
but personally I do not have the patience to play easier stuff
the problem is that harder stuff is pretty annoying to grind
most of the time
yeah, grinding attempts sucks
I just have to put up with it
it comes with the territory
and well i prefer to play enjoyable avoidances than forcing myself to play something like last tis
it's one reason why I spend so much time practicing
lorema2SMOREc haha get indentured noobs
hiiiiii
yeah, if something isn't enjoyable, no need to play it
hi Xoryla
but i feel that if i manage to finally learn every mayu pattern, this avoidance will become enjoyable
rng attacks are interesting
and music is catJAM
the absolute hardest stuff in mayumushi is also the rng
according to dragonxplayer
final and the mayumushi chasing you
im so excited!!!
but only after battlegrounds 100%
I also considered playing crazy mayumushi after DS
im more excited in the first bg100% clear in russian community so far
crazy mayu? youre crazy
yes, that will be a landmark moment for the russian community
i can still be 1st american 100% bg
reminds me of redire's k3 100%
american?
what avoidances have you cleared so far
wait, no american has done it yet huh
i feel like lilly and gureiga
and afoth probably
ive done none lol
good luck then!!
and i also quit playing these
but its still possible
if you really want to start grind
oh, yes, k3 100%
if you want to go for bg 100% ubur, I am 100% in support of you
it is a cooler accomplishment
yeah, no denying that
but ex avoidances... WutFace
yeah, it is much more painful
nothing in bg is actually bad
unlike ex kamilia
ex piano with red phase lottery  which ive got to 18 times already
ex dotkid
tokoroten
ex colonel with its buffed shit
yeah, it's just aids
ex dotkid oh god............
that's why there aren't many clears
even though k3 is super popular
If I were planning on doing k3 100% I would do ex dotkid first
so that if it sucks too much you can just quit without wasting too much time
after that ex emperor problably, since it's the hardest
i also wanted to clear it as the first ex boss rush clear
then everything else
but 2 hours passed
and it became super annoying already
just watch casualcraps clear and see how relieved he is that it's over
so i switched bosses
am i right if i say that his grind was 2 years long?
unsure
I was not around at the time
ex dotkid would be way more fun if intro didn't exist
yes
intro is the big, obvious problem with that avoidance
it's like ~2? minutes of absolutely nothing
followed by really cancerous rng
and with my situation (i was playing ex dotkid absolutely alone) it became one of the most annoying things i ever played
I'd say you made the right call by quitting
there are better things to play nowadays
like battlegrounds
probably it will be a bit more enjoyable if i return to it with my discord friends
but still
yeah, you could suffer through it with company
but why not play something better
intro is a waste of 2 minutes of your life
like death grips or something?
so basically that's the reason why i switched bosses in ex boss rush
to ex piano
has anything changed in terms of enjoyment? quite a bit
and it turns out ex piano sucks too with red piano BibleThump
and well with this, my priority is still battlegrounds stuff
still don't know how almost everyone passed it in 5~ hours
battlegrounds speedruns when?
afoth stage?
that's not true at all
i said it about ex p
oh
how people got a lucky lottery ticket in less than 10 hrs
do you use the practice tool?
sure, but not so often
avoidance luck is very high variance
that's how zero can clear vox diamond absolute in 3 hours
and how people like nogard can take 170 hours on mhc
you've had a ton of attempts on red phase
but thing's just haven't gone your way
it sucks, but that's part of the bullshit of grinding for clears
that's true
I can't wait to face it with DS
so many final deaths await
lets goooooo
waiting for it ;)
yeah, I will do my best to get good enough for attempts as soon as possible
so we can all see me suffer without delay
maybe some 1.0 speed rn?
yeah, sure, why not
how do you feel about it
t+pazolite moment incoming
yes, t+pazolite music
as for 1.0, I think I'm getting there
still going to need to practice the fall in particular though
as well as shower
but I cannot read 1.0 shower yet
even when I'm well rested
it probably needs you some time to get used to 1.0
after 0.9 grind
yeah, that is part of it
already can feel the nerves when you get to the shower in original game...)
yeah,and escpecially passing it
it must be really nerve-wracking
when i passed the shower for the first time my heart rate suddenly jumped to 160 bpm and i died to bursts basically immediately
sounds about right
i was so excited back then, felt like ohhhh yesssss
theeere we go
and the first time you passed bursts you beat the whole thing?
nope
2 "here we go again" deaths
oh that one
dying to that will suck
and these days happened on the same day
it's such bullshit
i was gaming
that day i got a crazy pb in ex rz in k3, got 2 "here we go again" pb's in ds and firsttried buffed cyber area in 1.30 k3
geez, that's crazy
some days you just go off
my fish clear came on a good day too
and well, the next 2 days i was playing games like a garbage dogshit
honestly, i deserved it after that gaming day
villainy rule
if you record the good days and don't show people the bad days, people will think you are amazing all the time Kappa
soooo truue
i made some antigaming streams with limited access
so no one ever could watch it
because it was such a shame
that's why I stream a lot of my practice
so people can see how bad I am
if I become good and people say that I am naturally talented, I could just show them this
by "this" you mean a pure consistency in most of ds attacks huh
people would think like what a cool player im watching rn!
in the last 5 minutes, I think I have taken 20 hours worth of deaths
in terms of attempts
and yeah you can't be bad when you managed to clear fish and some other avoidances
well, I'm glad that some people think this is okay to watch
mostly just fish
fish was a landmark moment for me because it gave me some "street cred"
it proved that I could actually play avoidance
not just say "avoidance is great, but I can't play it"
absolutely ok, and with chatting with streamer it becomes super enjoyable
especially when you speak a foreign language
yes, it must be good practice
I personally find it amazing that I can talk to someone who I would otherwise never meet, thousands of miles away
that's an amazing thing about avoidance
well, that's how internet works, basically Kappa
yep
I would like to clear this from this attack once
so many opportunities knowing basics of a foreign language opens
in terms of chatting with people
yeah, especially one as common as english
im glad i can understand people
and talk with them
and you're a great person to talk with
thank you very much!
I enjoy chatting with you as well
i wish you could talk with microphone, would've been cool as hell
yeah, the mic thing is a bit sad
on the bright side, no one will hear me complaining to myself about this avoidance
well with microphone there apeears a problem of understanding a person
yes, that too
my american accent might be difficult to understand for a nonative
because listening to a foreigner is harder
than chatting with him
in twitch chat
and you also cannot reread, once they've said it, if you didn't hear, they have to repeat it
well tbh i can also listen to a foreigner comfortably
although it is pretty difficult sometimes
yeah, once you're good enough it's not an issue
i watch bbf, stonk, maxify
and can properly understand what they're talking about
at least until slang moment happens
oh yeah, that must be difficult
particularly for new slang
some stuff that I hear is very recent
like, stuff that people only started saying a few years ago
and you basically just need a really good intuition for what it might mean
there's no way to guess from the word itself
only recently i learned some slang acronyms like ngl, tbh
so what to say here
eventually you will be a master of slang, I'm sure
ohhh
could've been it
yeah
I think that one was doable
there was a gap
but I need to practice
might be worth doing some right now
oh and there's firsttry
yeah, for me this is just luck at the moment
luckily it is not that unreasonable to get lucky here
yes, final can also be readable sometimes
I hate it
I think that's enough for today
thanks for watching everyone!
recently i returned to ds and after 5minute practice i got to disgusting arrows in less than 10 min
second clear?
could've been
that's kind of what I'd like to happen
practice a ton, then just get a clear in 5 hours and call it quits
so
but I doubt I can actually pull it off
thank you for streaming
streamer
lorema2ShimmyO
